mapper.select: select id,name from gk_majored_category where 1=1 and parentId=#{parentId}
select id as majoredId, name,educationLevel,subjectType,majoredType,degree,similarMajored,mainCourse,workGuide from gk_majored where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select id,name from gk_enroll_plan where 1=1 and batch=#{batchName} and majoredId=#{id}
select id,major_name as name,major_code as majorCode from zgk_major_base where major_name like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%') LIMIT 5

select count(*) from zgk_university uu left join zgk_university_major mm on uu.id=mm.universityId left join zgk_province pp on pp.id=uu.provinceCode left join zgk_data_dict dd on dd.type='PROPERTY' and dd.dictId=uu.type where mm.majorId=#{condition.majorId} and mm.educationLevel=#{condition.educationLevel}
select employmentRate from zgk_major mm where mm.id=#{condition.majorId}
select major_introduce from zgk_major_detail mm where mm.id=#{condition.majorId}
select specialisation from zgk_major_detail mm where mm.id=#{condition.majorId}

SELECT major_code as majoredId, discipline_sub_code as majorCategoryId, discipline_sub_name as majorCategoryName, discipline_code as disciplineCategoriesId, discipline_name as disciplineCategoriesName, major_name as majoredName from zgk_major_base WHERE discipline_code=#{categoryId}
select DISTINCT discipline_code as id,discipline_name as name,major_type as parentId from zgk_major_base where major_type=#{type}

select discipline_name as disciplineCategoriesName, discipline_sub_name as majorCategoryName, major_name as majoredName, major_code as majoredId from zgk_major_base where major_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition.majoredName},'%') and major_type = #{condition.type}

select zmb.major_code as id, zmb.major_name as majorName, zmb.employmentRate as employmentRate, zmb.salary_rank as salaryRank, zmb.major_code as majorCode, zmd.degree_offered as degreeOffered, zmd.schooling_duration as schoolingDuration, zmd.offer_courses as offerCourses, zmd.major_introduce as majorIntroduce from zgk_major_base zmb left join zgk_major_detail zmd on zmb.major_code=zmd.major_code where zmb.major_code=#{majorCode} limit 1
